text:
"Kayak nya kamu ngga tumbuh tinggi ya by." Celetuk Juyeon.
"Aku tumbuh tinggi tau! Cuma satu senti meter."
"Tumbuh kok satu senti doang."
"Biarin! Lagi pula aku ngga perlu tinggi - tinggi, yang penting ada kamu yang tinggi jadi aku bisa minta tolong ambilin sesuatu dibagian atas."
Juyeon terkekeh. "Iya ya. Lagian aku juga ngga suka yang terlalu tinggi, aku lebih suka yang kecil mungil kayak kamu. Gemes banget, kalo ngeselin tinggal banting aja ke kasur."
"Aku juga suka sama yang tinggi, kalo ngeselin tinggal tebas aja kakinya."
"Ugh sadis."
Mereka mencari bahan - bahan kebutuhan untuk didapur sambil mengobrol sampai tidak sadar troli mereka penuh. Dan sebagian tubuh Minjee yang sedang duduk di troli tertindih oleh belanjaan. Tapi bukan nya Minjee merasa risih justru dia tertawa, bahkan dia juga tidak mau turun dari trolinya.
"Minjee turun ya."
trans:
"Seems like you don't grow taller by." said Juyeon.
"I grow taller! just 1 centimeter."
"It's only grow just 1 cm."
"I don't care! Besides I don't need to be very tall, the important thing is that you are here so I can ask your help to pick up something at the top shelves."
Juyeon chuckled. "Ok ok. Besides I don't like someone very tall, I prefer the small little one like you. Very adorable, if you annoyed me I just throw you on the bed."
"I also like the tall ones, if I feel annoyed just tackle the legs."
"Ugh savages."
They are browsing ingredients for the kitchen while talking not realizing their trolley is full. And some part of Minjee's body, seated on the trolley crushed by the shopping items. But instead of feeling uncomfortable Minjee actually laughed, he even didn't want to get off the trolley.
"Minjee please get down."
